tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wine_tasting_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    venue VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    participants JSONB,
    wine_selections JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE wine_tasting_events (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    venue VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    participants VARCHAR(255),
    wine_selections TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE wine_selections (
    selection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    wine_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    wine_type VARCHAR(50),
    available_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE WineSelection (
    selection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Event(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participant(participant_id)
);
